hackeRnews 0.2.1
  • Reference
    • HackeRnews - specification
  • Changelog

Hacker News latest show stories

Source: R/api.R
get_latest_show_stories.Rd

Retrieves latest show stories using Hacker News API

Usage

get_latest_show_stories(max_items = NULL)

Arguments

max_items

Maximum number of items to retrieve. If max_items = NULL, returns all available

Value

list of latest show HN stories

Examples


# \donttest{
# get the latest show story on Hacker News
latest_show_story <- get_latest_show_stories(max_items = 1)
latest_show_story
#> [[1]]
#> List of 10
#>  $ by         : chr "lazarkap"
#>  $ descendants: int 6
#>  $ id         : int 43555409
#>  $ kids       : int [1:5] 43587684 43587487 43585454 43585870 43585767
#>  $ score      : int 18
#>  $ text       : chr "I built BuzzBench because I was frustrated with how complex performance testing tools have become. And I was en"| __truncated__
#>  $ time       : POSIXct[1:1], format: "2025-04-02 10:52:00"
#>  $ title      : chr "Show HN: I made a platform to load and performance test API's"
#>  $ type       : chr "story"
#>  $ url        : chr "https://buzzbench.io/"
#>  - attr(*, "class")= chr "hn_item"
#>
